reviews.text: Just a bog standard station. Staff can be a tad unhelpful when it comes to disrupted journeys due to cancellations etc but they are friendly nonetheless. Close to a good Starbucks, Gregg's and McDonald's. Amenities within the station, however, leave a little to be desired. Good station for connections to most areas of the UK
Not a bad train station all in, very helpful members of staff and more importantly, the station is nice and clean.
Great station! Loads of history! Nice variety of trains! And a very bust network of trains!
Clean and tidy with good display boards and helpful staff. Negotiating the stairs is a problem but there are lifts available.

A very large interchange station with a quiet and peaceful lounge if you travel first class. There was plenty of tea and coffee when I was there earlier today but there was no snacks left. They must have had a lot visitors in the morning.
